mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoNmbrStplatAgr Generator(Generator) 2018-06-08 */ NMBR_STPLAT_AGR_SN , STPLAT_CD , STPLAT_IEM_AGR_YN , MTM_INQ_SN , ORGZT_ORD_AFF_INQ_SN , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT , REGTR_ID FROM CSO_NMBR_STPLAT_AGR WHERE 1 = 1 AND NMBR_STPLAT_AGR_SN = #{nmbrStplatAgrSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteCsoNmbrStplatAgr Generator(Generator) 2018-06-08 */ FROM CSO_NMBR_STPLAT_AGR WHERE 1 = 1 AND NMBR_STPLAT_AGR_SN = #{nmbrStplatAgrSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
